thread.title: Barry McGee
thread.title_full: Mardi Gras Supplies reviewed by Barry McGee

author: Barry McGee
title: Barry McGee
text: I am over in Dallas,Tx. Been doing business with these folks 15-20 YEARS. NEVER had a problem with them. I make my Order online and they ship it right out to me. They are prompt, the shipment always arrives, and contents of shipment are always exactly what I ordered. It is a pleasure to do business with them.
